quotes.text: The way get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The future belongs to the competent. Get good, get better, be the best!
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: What you learn from a life in science is the vastness of our ignorance.
quotes.author: David Eagleman

quotes.text: Our virtues and our failures are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Impossible only means that you haven’t found the solution yet.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every brilliant experiment, like every great work of art, starts with an act of imagination.
quotes.author: Jonah Lehrer

quotes.text: Above all, don't fear difficult moments. The best comes from them.
quotes.author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

quotes.text: We cannot solve problems with the same thinking we used to create them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Shall I refuse my dinner because I do not fully understand the process of digestion?
quotes.author: Oliver Heaviside

quotes.text: Each problem that I solved became a rule, which served afterwards to solve other problems.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The secret of happiness, you see is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Life is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard
